snippet: Left-wing parties are weighing forming a coalition, which could bring down Prime Minister Pedro Passos Coelho’s government just weeks into its new term.
abstract: Portugal's October elections, expected to result in clear mandate for Prime Min Pedro Passos Coelho's center-right coalition, have instead splintered left and severely undermined lawmakers pushing for increasingly austere economic policies.
lead_paragraph: Left-wing parties are weighing forming a coalition, which could bring down Prime Minister Pedro Passos Coelho’s government just weeks into its new term.

headline.main: Rising Left Bloc in Portugal Could Threaten Austerity Drive
headline.print_headline: Rising Left Bloc in Portugal Could Threaten Austerity Drive
